xfy.fakeview.library.fview

接口 IFView

  • 所有超级接口:
    IView
    所有已知子接口:
    IFViewGroup
    所有已知实现类:
    FFrameLayout, FImageView, FTextView, FView, FViewGroup

    public interface IFView
extends IView
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/7. FView 接口 有很多接口和View很像 默认只有点击事件和长按事件

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  IFView.OnClickListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a view is clicked.
      static interface  IFView.OnLongClickListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a view has been clicked and held.
      static interface  IFView.Visibility

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean dispatchTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
      Pass the touch screen motion event down to the target view, or this view if it is the target.
      void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Manually render this view (and all of its children) to the given Canvas.
      IFView findFViewById(int id)
      Finds the first descendant view with the given ID, the view itself if the ID matches IView.getId(), or null if the ID is invalid (< 0) or there is no matching view in the hierarchy.

      Gets the background drawable
      int getBottom()
      Bottom position of this view relative to its parent.

      Returns the context the view is running in, through which it can access the current theme, resources, etc.

      Get the LayoutParams associated with this view.

      Gets the parent of this view.

      Return the full width measurement information for this view as computed by the most recent call to measure(int, int).

    • 方法详细资料

      • onAttachedToWindow

        void onAttachedToWindow()
        This is called when the view is attached to a window. At this point it has a Surface and will start drawing. Note that this function is guaranteed to be called before draw(Canvas), however it may be called any time before the first onDraw -- including before or after measure(int, int).
        另请参阅:
        onDetachedFromWindow()

      • onDetachedFromWindow

        void onDetachedFromWindow()
        This is called when the view is detached from a window. At this point it no longer has a surface for drawing.
        另请参阅:
        onAttachedToWindow()

      • setVisibility

        void setVisibility(int visibility)
        Set the visibility state of this view.
        参数:
        visibility - One of VISIBLE, INVISIBLE, or GONE.

      • getVisibility

        int getVisibility()
        Returns the visibility status for this view.
        返回:
        One of VISIBLE, INVISIBLE, or GONE.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set the enabled state of this view. The interpretation of the enabled state varies by subclass.
        参数:
        enabled - True if this view is enabled, false otherwise.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Returns the enabled status for this view. The interpretation of the enabled state varies by subclass.
        返回:
        True if this view is enabled, false otherwise.

      • measure

        void measure(int widthMeasureSpec,
             int heightMeasureSpec)

        This is called to find out how big a view should be. The parent supplies constraint information in the width and height parameters.

        The actual measurement work of a view is performed in FView.onMeasure(int, int), called by this method. Therefore, only FView.onMeasure(int, int) can and must be overridden by subclasses.

        参数:
        widthMeasureSpec - Horizontal space requirements as imposed by the parent
        heightMeasureSpec - Vertical space requirements as imposed by the parent
        另请参阅:
        FView.onMeasure(int, int)

      • layout

        void layout(int l,
            int t,
            int r,
            int b)
        Assign a size and position to a view and all of its descendants

        This is the second phase of the layout mechanism. (The first is measuring). In this phase, each parent calls layout on all of its children to position them. This is typically done using the child measurements that were stored in the measure pass().

        Derived classes should not override this method. Derived classes with children should override onLayout. In that method, they should call layout on each of their children.

        参数:
        l - Left position, relative to parent
        t - Top position, relative to parent
        r - Right position, relative to parent
        b - Bottom position, relative to parent

      • onLayout

        void onLayout(boolean changed,
              int l,
              int t,
              int r,
              int b)
        Called from layout when this view should assign a size and position to each of its children. Derived classes with children should override this method and call layout on each of their children.
        参数:
        changed - This is a new size or position for this view
        l - Left position, relative to parent
        t - Top position, relative to parent
        r - Right position, relative to parent
        b - Bottom position, relative to parent

      • draw

        void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Manually render this view (and all of its children) to the given Canvas. The view must have already done a full layout before this function is called. When implementing a view, implement FView.onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas) instead of overriding this method. If you do need to override this method, call the superclass version.
        参数:
        canvas - The Canvas to which the View is rendered.

      • setId

        void setId(int id)
        Sets the identifier for this view. The identifier does not have to be unique in this view's hierarchy. The identifier should be a positive number.
        参数:
        id - a number used to identify the view
        另请参阅:
        NO_ID, IView.getId(), findFViewById(int)

      • findFViewById

        IFView findFViewById(int id)
        Finds the first descendant view with the given ID, the view itself if the ID matches IView.getId(), or null if the ID is invalid (< 0) or there is no matching view in the hierarchy.

        Note: In most cases -- depending on compiler support -- the resulting view is automatically cast to the target class type. If the target class type is unconstrained, an explicit cast may be necessary.

        参数:
        id - the ID to search for
        返回:
        a view with given ID if found, or null otherwise

      • getContext

        android.content.Context getContext()
        Returns the context the view is running in, through which it can access the current theme, resources, etc.
        返回:
        The view's Context.

      • getFParent

        FViewParent getFParent()
        Gets the parent of this view. Note that the parent is a ViewParent and not necessarily a View.
        返回:
        Parent of this view.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        Invalidate the whole view. If the view is visible, draw(Canvas) will be called at some point in the future.

        This must be called from a UI thread. To call from a non-UI thread, call

      • getFLayoutParams

        IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams getFLayoutParams()
        Get the LayoutParams associated with this view. All views should have layout parameters. These supply parameters to the parent of this view specifying how it should be arranged. There are many subclasses of ViewGroup.LayoutParams, and these correspond to the different subclasses of ViewGroup that are responsible for arranging their children. This method may return null if this View is not attached to a parent ViewGroup or setFLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams) was not invoked successfully. When a View is attached to a parent ViewGroup, this method must not return null.
        返回:
        The LayoutParams associated with this view, or null if no parameters have been set yet

      • setFLayoutParams

        void setFLayoutParams(IFViewGroup.FLayoutParams params)
        Set the layout parameters associated with this view. These supply parameters to the parent of this view specifying how it should be arranged. There are many subclasses of ViewGroup.LayoutParams, and these correspond to the different subclasses of ViewGroup that are responsible for arranging their children.
        参数:
        params - The layout parameters for this view, cannot be null

      • setBackgroundColor

        void setBackgroundColor(int color)
        Sets the background color for this view.
        参数:
        color - the color of the background

      • setBackgroundResource

        void setBackgroundResource(int resid)
        Set the background to a given resource. The resource should refer to a Drawable object or 0 to remove the background.
        参数:
        resid - The identifier of the resource.

      • setBackground

        void setBackground(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable background)
        Set the background to a given Drawable, or remove the background. If the background has padding, this View's padding is set to the background's padding. However, when a background is removed, this View's padding isn't touched. If setting the padding is desired, please use setPadding(int, int, int, int).
        参数:
        background - The Drawable to use as the background, or null to remove the background

      • getBackground

        android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getBackground()
        Gets the background drawable
        返回:
        The drawable used as the background for this view, if any.
        另请参阅:
        setBackground(Drawable)

      • post

        boolean post(java.lang.Runnable action)

        Causes the Runnable to be added to the message queue. The runnable will be run on the user interface thread.

        参数:
        action - The Runnable that will be executed.
        返回:
        Returns true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting.
        另请参阅:
        postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable, long), removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable)

      • postDelayed

        boolean postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable action,
                    long delayMillis)

        Causes the Runnable to be added to the message queue, to be run after the specified amount of time elapses. The runnable will be run on the user interface thread.

        参数:
        action - The Runnable that will be executed.
        delayMillis - The delay (in milliseconds) until the Runnable will be executed.
        返回:
        true if the Runnable was successfully placed in to the message queue. Returns false on failure, usually because the looper processing the message queue is exiting. Note that a result of true does not mean the Runnable will be processed -- if the looper is quit before the delivery time of the message occurs then the message will be dropped.
        另请参阅:
        post(java.lang.Runnable), removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable)

      • removeCallbacks

        boolean removeCallbacks(java.lang.Runnable action)

        Removes the specified Runnable from the message queue.

        参数:
        action - The Runnable to remove from the message handling queue
        返回:
        true if this view could ask the Handler to remove the Runnable, false otherwise. When the returned value is true, the Runnable may or may not have been actually removed from the message queue (for instance, if the Runnable was not in the queue already.)
        另请参阅:
        post(java.lang.Runnable), postDelayed(java.lang.Runnable, long)

      • requestLayoutAll

        void requestLayoutAll()
        请求布局整个view树

      • requestFViewTreeLayout

        void requestFViewTreeLayout()
        请求布局整个FView树

      • requestLayoutThisView

        void requestLayoutThisView()
        请求布局此view及其子view树

      • getMeasuredWidth

        int getMeasuredWidth()
        Return the full width measurement information for this view as computed by the most recent call to measure(int, int). This should be used during measurement and layout calculations only. Use getWidth() to see how wide a view is after layout.
        返回:
        The measured width of this view as a bit mask.

      • getMeasuredHeight

        int getMeasuredHeight()
        Return the full height measurement information for this view as computed by the most recent call to measure(int, int). This should be used during measurement and layout calculations only. Use getHeight() to see how wide a view is after layout.
        返回:
        The measured height of this view as a bit mask.

      • getMeasuredState

        int getMeasuredState()
        Return only the state bits of getMeasuredWidth() and getMeasuredHeight(), combined into one integer. The width component is in the regular bits MEASURED_STATE_MASK and the height component is at the shifted bits MEASURED_HEIGHT_STATE_SHIFT>>MEASURED_STATE_MASK.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Return the width of the your view.
        返回:
        The width of your view, in pixels.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Return the height of your view.
        返回:
        The height of your view, in pixels.

      • getLeft

        int getLeft()
        Left position of this view relative to its parent.
        返回:
        The left edge of this view, in pixels.

      • getTop

        int getTop()
        Top position of this view relative to its parent.
        返回:
        The top of this view, in pixels.

      • getRight

        int getRight()
        Right position of this view relative to its parent.
        返回:
        The right edge of this view, in pixels.

      • getBottom

        int getBottom()
        Bottom position of this view relative to its parent.
        返回:
        The bottom of this view, in pixels.

      • getPaddingLeft

        int getPaddingLeft()
        Returns the left padding of this view. If there are inset and enabled scrollbars, this value may include the space required to display the scrollbars as well.
        返回:
        the left padding in pixels

      • getPaddingTop

        int getPaddingTop()
        Returns the top padding of this view.
        返回:
        the top padding in pixels

      • getPaddingRight

        int getPaddingRight()
        Returns the right padding of this view. If there are inset and enabled scrollbars, this value may include the space required to display the scrollbars as well.
        返回:
        the right padding in pixels

      • getPaddingBottom

        int getPaddingBottom()
        Returns the bottom padding of this view. If there are inset and enabled scrollbars, this value may include the space required to display the scrollbars as well.
        返回:
        the bottom padding in pixels

      • setPadding

        void setPadding(int l,
                int t,
                int r,
                int b)
        Sets the padding. The view may add on the space required to display the scrollbars, depending on the style and visibility of the scrollbars. So the values returned from getPaddingLeft(), getPaddingTop(), getPaddingRight() and getPaddingBottom() may be different from the values set in this call.
        参数:
        l - the left padding in pixels
        t - the top padding in pixels
        r - the right padding in pixels
        b - the bottom padding in pixels

      • isTouchInView

        boolean isTouchInView(float x,
                      float y)
        坐标是否在view内部
        参数:
        x - 触摸事件的x坐标
        y - 触摸事件的y坐标
        返回:
        true: 在内部，可做点击或其他事件 false: 不在，不处理

      • dispatchTouchEvent

        boolean dispatchTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Pass the touch screen motion event down to the target view, or this view if it is the target.
        参数:
        event - The motion event to be dispatched.
        返回:
        True if the event was handled by the view, false otherwise.

      • onTouchEvent

        boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Implement this method to handle touch screen motion events.

        If this method is used to detect click actions, it is recommended that the actions be performed by implementing and calling FView.performClick(). This will ensure consistent system behavior, including:

        • dispatching OnClickListener calls
        参数:
        event - The motion event.
        返回:
        True if the event was handled, false otherwise.

      • setOnClickListener

        void setOnClickListener(IFView.OnClickListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked when this view is clicked. If this view is not clickable, it becomes clickable.
        参数:
        listener - The callback that will run
        另请参阅:
        FView.setClickable(boolean)

      • setOnLongClickListener

        void setOnLongClickListener(IFView.OnLongClickListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked when this view is clicked and held. If this view is not long clickable, it becomes long clickable.
        参数:
        listener - The callback that will run
        另请参阅:
        FView.setLongClickable(boolean)
